Create a new node in the organization, node configuration is defined by the SKU. The /nodes/create API accepts requests in the following format:

CreateNodeRequest Model - Request to create a new node in an organization.
name string
The name of the new node.
organizationId string
ID of the organization.
sku SKU object
SKU object out of the provided node configuration.
Example 
{
  "name": "string",
  "organizationId": "string",
  "sku": {
    "Cores": 0,
    "Memory": 0,
    "Target": "Backtest"
  }
}
SKU Model - SKU object out of the provided node configuration.
Cores integer
The number of CPU cores in the node.
Memory integer
Size of RAM in GB of the Node.
Target string Enum
NodeTypes enum for all possible options of target environments. Options : ['Backtest', 'Research', 'Live']
Example 
{
  "Cores": 0,
  "Memory": 0,
  "Target": "Backtest"
}
NodeType Model - NodeTypes enum for all possible options of target environments.
NodeType string Enum
NodeTypes enum for all possible options of target environments. Options : ['Backtest', 'Research', 'Live']
Example 
{
  "NodeType": "Backtest"
}
